  • Uses of SpriteException in edu.uoc.uocleaner.controller

    Methods in edu.uoc.uocleaner.controller that throw SpriteException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Game.loadLevel()
    Loads a new level, creating a level object and a vacuum object.
    void Game.moveVacuum​(int dRow, int dCol)
    Given a movement in row axis (dRow) and in column axis (dCol), moves the vacuum cleaner.
    boolean Game.nextLevel()
    Increases the total score, resets the level score, checks if there is a new level and loads the level.
    void Game.reload()
    Resets the level score and load the current level again.
